scenario.name: Second ReInvite
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:+17242455555@192.168.55.62:5070 SIP/2.0 Route: [$1] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 192.168.55.62:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:+17661112233@192.168.55.62:[local_port];transport=[transport]>;tag=PersistentFromTagForTestingOnly123 To: [$3] Call-ID: [$4] CSeq: 3 INVITE Contact: <sip:+17661112233@192.168.55.62:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,REGISTER,REFER,INFO,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,PRACK,UPDATE,OPTIONS Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=2_reInvite!!! 265 9628 IN IP[local_ip_type] 192.168.55.62 s=SIP 2nd reInvite!!! c=IN IP[media_ip_type] 192.168.55.62 t=0 0 m=audio 10004 RTP/AVP 8 18 0 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:0 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=sendrecv a=rtcp:56422 IN IP4 10.0.2.102 a=maxptime:60
ACK sip:+17242455555@192.168.55.62:5070 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 192.168.55.62:[local_port];branch=[$6] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 3 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
